Package socket.clientserver.assignment2

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Acknowledgement
    The class Acknowledgement provides a model for the server to communicate to the client if the purchase is successfully done or not.
    Client
    The class Client defines a client that sends an object to a server and receives its answer.
    Offer
    The class Offer provides a simplified model to make/read an offer.
    Price
    The class Price provides a simplified model to make/read a price.
    Server
    The class Server defines a server that waits for a message and then sends an answer.
    ServerThread
    The class ServerThread manages the interaction with a client of the server.
